author: Staff Reporter
text:
The police are on the lookout for a security guard at the Government Kilpauk Medical College Hospital (KMCH) as he is believed to have stolen $ 300 from a Bangladeshi national on Wednesday.

Meena Dhon, who was suffering from a renal failure, was supposed to get admitted to Christian Medical College, Vellore.

However, after landing in Chennai, his condition worsened and he was taken to KMCH Kilpauk Medical College where he passed away.

His father, who accompanied him, then said that $ 300, which was with them, had gone missing. The police have registered a case and, based on a complaint, are on the lookout for a hospital guard who is believed to have stolen the money.
title: Money stolen from Bangladesh national
